#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#include<utility>
#include<stack>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MIN -100000000
#define MAX 100000000
#define ll long long int
template<class T>T gcd(T a,T b){return (b==0)?a:gcd(b,a%b);}
template<class T>T lcm(T a,T b){return (a*b)/gcd(a,b);}
template<class T>T powmod(T a,T b,T mod) {T res=1;if(a>=mod)a%=mod;for(;b;b>>=1){if(b&1)res=res*a;if(res>=mod)res%=mod;a=a*a;if(a>=mod)a%=mod;}return res;}

/* HOPE n WILL :)
	NGU :)
	_/\_ 	*/
// MG

//int a[1000001];
int flag[1005];
int main()
{
	int n,i,t,x;
	//scanf("%d",&t);
	t=1;
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);	
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&x);
			flag[x]++;
		}
		int max1=MIN;
		int ans;
		for(i=1;i<=1000;i++)
		{
			if(flag[i]>max1)
			{
				max1=flag[i];
				ans=i;
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<"\n"<<max1<<"\n";
	}

	return 0;
}
